value:
The castle is the cat's meow!
It's almost more than I can take
in—bigger than my village!

I was known as a decent hunter
back home. My village needed me
when we had a crummy harvest.

Hey, thanks for always checking in
with me. I'd like it better though if
you and I could explore outside!

You able to use that weapon of
yours to bring down geese?
We should go hunting if so!

Hmm? Just tightening my
bowstring. Always have to stay
on top of my gear!

Hey, I'm Rebecca! Just here to
do a job—passing on a hello
from $Nf!

Whoa! Who knew that I could
do that well?

Nice to get even better with
my trusty bow!

Yikes. My bowstring must
have snapped there.

Thank you! I'll keep getting better
with my bow!

I'm Rebecca—a pretty decent hunter,
if you ask me. And I'm a real quick
shot with a bow!

I just can't say how glad I am
to be here. Everyone's friendly
as friendly gets!$k$pThere's never a dull moment,
which is good for me, since
I don't like being left alone.$k$pYears ago, my brother left our
village without saying a word.
Never came back either.$k$pI waited...you know, day after
day, week after week, and
year after...$k$pOh, my! Sorry for carrying on.
Don't want to get weepy
all over you!$k$pBesides, that's all in the past.
I've got you and everyone
else around here now.$k$pJust don't you get any funny
ideas about disappearing
on me, all right? Good.
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
N-nooo!
Deep breath and—!
Relax, Rebecca...!
Focus... Focus...!
Take that!
Forgive me...
Heehee
You need me for anything, just holler and I'll come running.
Oh! Didn't mean to be jumpy. You startled me.
I make a real fine lunch, don't you know it!
Fresh fruit. Roast fowl. Nothing better.
Check my bow...? And the string...? Yep, all in good shape!
I'm pretty good with a bow. Or that's what they say.
Is there anything you like to eat in particular?
Mm-hmm?
Where to?
Let's go!
